course_name: Indigenous Art and Culture Field School
description: Indigenous Art and Culture Field School involves a week-long class residency at a remote community Indigenous art centre where students are involved in art and culture workshops that cover topics where art relates to society, language, and the environment as well as skills required for an arts worker in remote Australian art centres.
restricted: Quota restricted to 12 enrolments. The course may be cancelled if there are fewer than 10 enrolments. Applicants, please contact the Course Coordinator for indicative costs.
